Package org.apache.heron.scheduler.client

Class HttpServiceSchedulerClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.heron.scheduler.client.HttpServiceSchedulerClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISchedulerClient
    public class HttpServiceSchedulerClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISchedulerClient
    This class manages topology by sending request to appropriate HTTP endpoint of the topology scheduler service.
